title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: This is a few compendium of nigeria cryptocurrency discussion that varies with bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, sometimes some of our threads is not educating most of us of bitcoin but discussing things that is related to nigeria problems, it's good to discussion our problems but the most of thing that brought us here is to acquire and accumulate the education of cryptocurrencies both bitcoin and altcoins.I made this compendium so that most of our newbie that will join us in features will like to read from the compendium topic compiled by me, so that it will be very easy to get some of our discussions and interesting topics in one particular point. I don't have any ambition of creating this, except easy access for our upcoming bitcoiners to read up. I will use this medium to call the attention of the following to assess my compendium of the few post I justify personally as good post...the following. @CryptopreneurBrainboss @Igebotz @Charles-Tim @hugeblackNO|Quality post in year 2023 in nigeria local board|NAMES|1|Re: [CHART]  [Edu] Bitcoin Wallet UTXO and Consolidation | Igebotz|2|Re: Newbies avoid plagiarism.| Hatchy|3|Re:Crypto awareness  | Charles-Tim|4|Re:Make we talk locally, truely how you dey change your crypto to Naira? | CryptopreneurBrainboss|5|Re: Important of seed phrase | Riginac111 |6| [Edu] how to secure profit while trading|promise444c5   |7|Re: Bitcoin vs Altcoins – projected Marketcap |Chilwell |8|Re: Be smart while using a p2p exchanges   | Hatchy |9|Re:Have you ever been scammed?  |odunybiz |10|Re:The Total Amount Nigerians Have Spent in Bitcoin. | Agbe |11|Re: Bitcoin price speculation (BTC/NGN)|Charles-Tim  |
